error.description: Something went wrong. Please try again later and if you are still experiencing problems then report the error via email.

intro.sendAndRequestTokensDescription: Creating an account is your first step in benefiting from blockchain technology. With your account, you can securely send and request tokens within and across blockchain applications.
intro.uniqueAvatarDescription: The Avatar represents the address, making it easy to recognize.
intro.manageApplicationsDescription: You can manage several blockchain application assets using your accounts.

menu.enableDerivationPath: Enable access to legacy Lisk accounts

descriptions.biometrics: Use {{sensorType}} to encrypt and use account password.

biometrics.disableDescription: Disabling your face ID requires you to enter account specific password to sign transaction.
biometrics.description: Here’s what you need to know:
biometrics.description1: Face ID offers a secure and faster way to decrypt your encrypted secret recovery phrase and sign transactions.
biometrics.title2: You can always turn it off
biometrics.description2: You can disable {{sensorType}} at any time, and authenticate with your account specific password.

multisignature.description1: This is a multisignature account, which allows a group of users to control shared LSK.
multisignature.description2: This account requires {{numberOfSignatures}} signatures to create a transaction.

error.title: A bookmark with this name already exists

send.description: Sending transaction using multisignature accounts is available only on Lisk Desktop.

fingerprint.faceId: Look at the front camera to authenticate
fingerprint.touchId: Place your finger over the touch sensor to authenticate

bookmarks.emptyText: You do not have any bookmarks yet.

addBookmark.invalidLabel: The label must be between 3 to 20 characters

deleteBookmark.title: Delete bookmark
deleteBookmark.description: Are you sure you want to delete this account? You’ll be able to add the account again.

disabled.title: Disabled Bookmark
disabled.description: This bookmark is associated with a legacy account and can no longer be used.

btcRemoval.title: Please note: BTC support has been removed as of Lisk Mobile {{release}}
btcRemoval.description: If you are affected by this change, please tap the link below to learn how to access your BTC using an alternative application.

safeKeeping.title: Save your secret recovery phrase
safeKeeping.description: Please write down these 12 words carefully, and store them in a safe place.
safeKeeping.understandResponsibilityDescription: I understand that it's my responsibility to keep my secret recovery phrase safe.

confirm.title: Confirm your secret recovery phrase
confirm.description: Tap and fill in the blanks.

success.title: Great! Your account is now created
success.description: You can now add your account to Lisk Wallet by clicking on 'Continue to add account', to be able to send and request tokens and much more.

setup.decryptPassphraseError: Unable to decrypt account. Please check your password.
setup.addAccountDescription: Enter your secret recovery phrase to manage your account.
setup.passwordSetupDescription: This password is used to encrypt your secret recovery phrase, which will be used for managing your account.
setup.passwordSetupSuccessDescription: You can now download your encrypted secret recovery phrase and use it to add your account on other devices.

migration.title: Introducing password set up for Lisk V3
migration.content: It looks like you already have this account saved on this device. To keep your account secure, we’re introducing passwords. With passwords, you will be able to sign your transactions without your passphrase.

form.termsAgreementText: I agree to store my encrypted secret recovery phrase on this device.

errors.noEmptyConfirmPasswordError: Confirm password must have a value
errors.passwordRequirementsError: Password must contain 8 characters, one uppercase, one lowercase, one number and one special case character.

add.successTitle: Perfect! Application has now been added
add.successDescription: You can see a list of your applications on the application dropdown.
add.errorGenericDescription: We’re unable to add your application to your Lisk Mobile. Please try again.
add.errorDescription: We’re unable to add {{appName}} application to your Lisk Mobile. Please try again.
add.errorConnecting: Error connecting application. Please try again.

delete.title: Remove application?
delete.descriptionText: This application will no longer be in your application list.

success.title: Application has now been removed
success.description: You can always add {{applicationName}} again to your application list.

deleteDefaultApplicationModal.description: A default application can not be removed

externalApplicationList.title: External connections
externalApplicationList.emptyText: You do not have external connections yet.
externalApplicationList.connectionDescription: This website is trying to connect with your lisk wallet
externalApplicationList.accountsTitle: Account(s) to use on this site
externalApplicationList.bridgeApplicationDescription: Paste WalletConnect URI to connection the bridge server

externalApplicationSignatureRequest.errorOnSignTransactionText: Unable to sign your transaction. Please try again.

notification.description: {{appName}} application requesting signature from your Lisk wallet.

sign.copyToClipboardButtonText: Copy and redirect to application site

account.description: Select an account to proceed with this transaction.

tokenSelect.tokenAmountFieldPlaceholderPlain: Select a token to add amount

confirmAndSign.title: Enter your account password
confirmAndSign.description: Please provide your account password to sign this transaction.

success.title: Transaction submitted
success.description: Your transaction has been successfully submitted to the network.

error.title: Transaction failed
error.description1: There was an error on the transaction.

errors.generalMessage: Please fill all the required fields to send your tokens.
errors.senderApplicationChainID: Application to send from must be specified
errors.recipientApplicationChainID: Application who receives the tokens must be specified
errors.tokenID: Token to send must be specified
errors.amountMustBePositive: Token amount must be a positive number

priority.title: Transaction priority
priority.description1: When the network is busy, transactions with a higher priority are confirmed sooner.

transactionFee.title: Transaction fee
transactionFee.description1: Transaction fees are the sum of the byte based fee, account initialisation fee, and the selected network priority fee.

messageFee.title: Message fee
messageFee.description1: Message fees are the incentive given to relayer for collecting messages to be transported from sending network to recipient network.

accountsManager.title: Manage accounts
accountsManager.modalDescription: You can edit, switch and backup your account and also you can remove an account that you’re not using at the moment.
accountsManager.screenDescription: You can switch your account and also remove any account you’re not using at the moment.
accountsManager.deleteAccountDescription: This account will no longer be stored on this device. You can backup your secret recovery phrase before remove it.

editAccount.editAccountSuccess: You can now download encrypted secret recovery phrase to this effect.

accounts.emptyTokenMessage: You have no tokens on this account yet.

transactionList.emptyText: You have no transactions on this account yet.
transactionList.title: Transactions

errors.dryRunErrorMainMessage: There was an error validating the transaction.
errors.broadcastErrorDescription: Error submitting your transaction. Please try again later.
errors.signErrorDescription: Error signing your transaction. Please try again later.

errors.displayDenomNotFoundMessage: Display denomination not found on units.
